import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import CustomizedBtn from "../../atoms/CustomizedBtn/CustomizedBtn"; import { editedsuccessmsg } from '../../organisms/SuccessMsg/SuccessMsg'; import SelectDate from "../../atoms/CustomizedDatepicker/SelectDate"; import '../../../style/style.css'; const CustomerFollowUpForm = ({ rowdata, handleClose }) => { const [updaterowdata, setUpdaterowdata] = useState(); useEffect(() => { setUpdaterowdata(rowdata); }, []) const submiteventclicked = () => { fetch('http://localhost:3000/updateCustomerDetails', { method: 'put', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, mode: 'cors', body: JSON.stringify(updaterowdata) }) .then(res => { return res.json() }) .then(data => { const res = editedsuccessmsg({}); alert(res.msg); handleClose(); }) } const changeevent = (event) => { setUpdaterowdata({ ...updaterowdata, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } return (
Edit Customer Details
) } export default CustomerFollowUpForm;
